name: !doctype
title: Document Type
desc: Declares the document type and HTML version.

name: html
title: Root element
desc: Top-level element that contains the whole HTML document.

name: head
title: Head
desc: Container for metadata, links, scripts and title.

name: body
title: Body
desc: Contains the page content that is rendered in the browser.

name: h1
title: Heading level 1
desc: Top-level heading for page titles.

name: h2
title: Heading level 2
desc: Section heading.

name: p
title: Paragraph
desc: Block of text for paragraphs.

name: a
title: Anchor (link)
desc: Creates hyperlinks to navigate between pages or anchors.

name: strong
title: Strong (bold)
desc: Marks text of strong importance (typically bold).

name: em
title: Emphasis (italic)
desc: Marks text that has stress emphasis (typically italic).

name: ul
title: Unordered list
desc: Creates a bulleted list.

name: ol
title: Ordered list
desc: Creates a numbered list.

name: li
title: List item
desc: Represents an item inside a list.

name: img
title: Image
desc: Embeds an image; include alt text for accessibility.

name: video
title: Video
desc: Embeds a video player with optional controls.

name: audio
title: Audio
desc: Embeds an audio player.

name: form
title: Form
desc: Collects user input through controls like inputs and buttons.

name: input
title: Input
desc: Single-line text field or other input types (text, email, password...).

name: label
title: Label
desc: Associates text with a form control for accessibility.

name: button
title: Button
desc: Clickable button for actions or form submission.

name: section
title: Section (semantic)
desc: Thematic grouping of content on a page.

name: article
title: Article
desc: Independent, self-contained content such as a blog post.

name: nav
title: Navigation
desc: Navigation links for the site.

name: footer
title: Footer
desc: Footer for page information and links.

name: table
title: Table
desc: Tabular data container.

name: iframe
title: Inline frame
desc: Embeds another HTML page inside a page.
